zh-cn: 小约瑟夫·罗比内特·拜登

birth_place.zh-cn: 斯克兰顿 (宾夕法尼亚州)

description.zh-cn: 美国民主党籍政治人物，曾任特拉华州联邦参议员、第47任美国副总统，现任第46任美国总统。
description.en: An American politician of the Democratic Party, who served as a U.S. Senator from Delaware, the 47th Vice President, and is the 46th and current President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国的国家元首、政府首脑与三军统帅。
description.en: The head of state and head of government of the United States of America, and commander-in-chief of the armed forces.

en: Vice President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国联邦政府中排名第二的官位。
description.en: The second-highest office in the executive branch of the U.S. federal government.

description.zh-cn: 美国民主党籍政治人物，现任美国副总统。
description.en: An American politician and attorney who is the current vice president of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物、商人和电视名人，第45任美国总统。
description.en: An American politician, media personality, and businessman who served as the 45th president of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第44任美国总统。
description.en: An American politician who served as the 44th president of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国国会的两院之一。
description.en: One of the two chambers of the United States Congress.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第46任美国副总统。
description.en: An American politician and businessman who served as the 46th vice president of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第48任美国副总统。
description.en: An American politician who served as the 48th vice president of the United States.

nodes.id: 美国参议院外交委员会

zh-cn: 美国参议院外交委员会
en: United States Senate Committee on Foreign Relations

description.zh-cn: 美国参议院的常设委员会。
description.en: A standing committee of the United States Senate.

nodes.id: 美国参议院司法委员会

zh-cn: 美国参议院司法委员会
en: United States Senate Committee on the Judiciary

description.zh-cn: 美国参议院的常设委员会。
description.en: A standing committee of the United States Senate.

nodes.id: 斯克兰顿 (宾夕法尼亚州)

zh-cn: 斯克兰顿 (宾夕法尼亚州)

description.zh-cn: 乔·拜登的第一任妻子。
description.en: Joe Biden's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 乔·拜登的第二任妻子，现任美国第一夫人。
description.en: Joe Biden's second wife and the current First Lady of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 乔·拜登的长子，曾任特拉华州总检察长。
description.en: Joe Biden's eldest son, who served as the Attorney General of Delaware.

description.zh-cn: 乔·拜登的次子，律师和商人。
description.en: Joe Biden's second son, a lawyer and businessman.

description.zh-cn: 乔·拜登的女儿，在一场车祸中与母亲一同丧生。
description.en: Joe Biden's daughter, who died in a car crash with her mother.

description.zh-cn: 乔·拜登与吉尔·拜登的女儿，社会工作者。
description.en: The daughter of Joe Biden and Jill Biden, a social worker.

description.zh-cn: 美国的两个主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the two major contemporary political parties in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于特拉华州的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university located in Delaware.

description.zh-cn: 位于纽约州雪城的一所私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in Syracuse, New York.

description.zh-cn: 美国第59届总统选举，乔·拜登击败时任总统唐纳·川普。
description.en: The 59th quadrennial presidential election, in which Joe Biden defeated incumbent president Donald Trump.

description.zh-cn: 一场由美国领导的35国联盟为回应伊拉克入侵科威特而发动的战争。
description.en: A war waged by coalition forces from 35 nations led by the United States against Iraq in response to Iraq's invasion and annexation of Kuwait.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪90年代在前南斯拉夫境内发生的一系列独立的但又相互关联的种族冲突、独立战争和叛乱。
description.en: A series of separate but related ethnic conflicts, wars of independence and insurgencies fought in the former Yugoslavia from 1991 to 2001.

description.zh-cn: 一场由美国及其盟友发动的旷日持久的武装冲突，始于2003年入侵伊拉克。
description.en: A protracted armed conflict that began with the 2003 invasion of Iraq by a United States-led coalition.

description.zh-cn: 美国第56届总统选举，贝拉克·奥巴马击败约翰·麦凯恩。
description.en: The 56th quadrennial presidential election, in which Barack Obama defeated John McCain.

description.zh-cn: 美国第57届总统选举，时任总统贝拉克·奥巴马击败米特·罗姆尼成功连任。
description.en: The 57th quadrennial presidential election, in which incumbent President Barack Obama was re-elected by defeating Mitt Romney.

description.zh-cn: 一场严重的全球性经济危机。
description.en: A severe worldwide economic crisis.

description.zh-cn: 美国和俄罗斯之间的一项核武器削减条约。
description.en: A nuclear arms reduction treaty between the United States and the Russian Federation.

description.zh-cn: 2012年12月14日在美国康涅狄格州桑迪胡克小学发生的一起大规模枪击事件。
description.en: A mass shooting that occurred on December 14, 2012, at Sandy Hook Elementary School in Connecticut, United States.

description.zh-cn: 唐纳·川普担任美国总统期间的内阁。
description.en: The Cabinet of the United States during the presidency of Donald Trump.

description.zh-cn: 《联合国气候变化框架公约》下的一项关于减缓、适应和融资的国际条约。
description.en: An international treaty on climate change, adopted in 2015.

description.zh-cn: 一项旨在加速美国从COVID-19大流行病及其经济衰退中恢复的经济刺激法案。
description.en: A $1.9 trillion economic stimulus bill intended to speed up the United States' recovery from the economic and health effects of the COVID-19 pandemic and the ongoing recession.

nodes.id: 基础设施投资和就业法案

zh-cn: 基础设施投资和就业法案

description.zh-cn: 一项针对美国交通和基础设施的联邦法规。
description.en: A United States federal statute concerning U.S. transportation and infrastructure.

description.zh-cn: 一项旨在通过降低处方药价格和投资国内能源生产来抑制通货膨胀的美国法律。
description.en: A United States law which aims to curb inflation by reducing prescription drug prices and investing into domestic energy production.

description.zh-cn: 美国法学家，现任美国最高法院大法官。
description.en: An American jurist who serves as an associate justice of the Supreme Court of the United States.

en: Withdrawal of United States troops from Afghanistan

description.zh-cn: 拜登政府领导下美军从阿富汗撤离的事件，导致塔利班迅速占领该国。
description.en: The withdrawal of U.S. military forces from Afghanistan under the Biden administration, which led to the swift takeover of the country by the Taliban.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯对乌克兰发动的大规模军事入侵，是自2014年以来俄乌战争的重大升级。
description.en: A full-scale invasion of Ukraine by Russia, a major escalation of the Russo-Ukrainian War that began in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 2023年10月7日，哈马斯对以色列发动袭击后爆发的武装冲突。
description.en: An armed conflict that began on 7 October 2023 with an attack by Hamas on Israel.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚、英国和美国之间的三边安全伙伴关系。
description.en: A trilateral security pact between Australia, the United Kingdom, and the United States.

description.zh-cn: 一个由北美和欧洲国家组成的政府间军事联盟。
description.en: An intergovernmental military alliance between North American and European countries.

nodes.id: 乔·拜登退出2024年美国总统选举

zh-cn: 乔·拜登退出2024年美国总统选举

description.zh-cn: 2024年7月21日，乔·拜登宣布放弃竞选连任美国总统。
description.en: On July 21, 2024, Joe Biden announced he was withdrawing from his campaign for re-election as President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府官员和外交官，现任美国国务卿。
description.en: American government official and diplomat serving as the current United States Secretary of State.

description.zh-cn: 美国经济学家，现任美国财政部长。
description.en: American economist serving as the current United States Secretary of the Treasury.

description.zh-cn: 美国退役四星上将，现任美国国防部长。
description.en: American retired four-star army general, serving as the current United States Secretary of Defense.

description.zh-cn: 美国律师和法学家，现任美国司法部长。
description.en: American lawyer and jurist serving as the current United States Attorney General.

description.zh-cn: 美国法官和法学家，其最高法院提名曾被参议院否决。
description.en: American judge and legal scholar whose nomination to the U.S. Supreme Court was rejected by the Senate.

description.zh-cn: 美国法学家，现任美国最高法院大法官。
description.en: An American jurist who serves as an associate justice of the Supreme Court of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国律师和学者，曾指控克拉伦斯·托马斯性骚扰。
description.en: An American lawyer and academic who accused Clarence Thomas of sexual harassment.

description.zh-cn: 前塞尔维亚和南斯拉夫总统，因战争罪被起诉。
description.en: Former president of Serbia and Yugoslavia, who was indicted for war crimes.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任亚利桑那州联邦参议员。
description.en: An American politician who served as a United States Senator from Arizona.

description.zh-cn: 伊拉克第五任总统。
description.en: The fifth President of Iraq.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任参议院多数党领袖和少数党领袖。
description.en: An American politician who served as Senate Majority Leader and Minority Leader.

description.zh-cn: 基地组织的创始人，于2011年被美军击毙。
description.en: The founder of al-Qaeda, killed in a U.S. military operation in 2011.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任美国第一夫人、联邦参议员和国务卿。
description.en: An American politician who served as First Lady, U.S. Senator, and Secretary of State.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，现任佛蒙特州联邦参议员。
description.en: An American politician serving as the junior United States Senator from Vermont.

description.zh-cn: 乌克兰演员、政治人物，现任乌克兰总统。
description.en: A Ukrainian comedian, actor, and politician who is the current president of Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中共中央总书记、中国国家主席和中央军委主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician who has been the general secretary of the Chinese Communist Party (CCP), chairman of the Central Military Commission (CMC), and president of the People's Republic of China (PRC).

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治人物，现任俄罗斯总统。
description.en: A Russian politician and former intelligence officer who is the current president of Russia.

position.en: 47th Vice President of the United States
Vice President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 在奥巴马担任总统期间担任其副总统。
description.en: Served as Vice President during Barack Obama's presidency.

position.en: Vice President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 在拜登担任总统期间担任其副总统。
description.en: Serves as Vice President during Joe Biden's presidency.

relationships.target: 斯克兰顿 (宾夕法尼亚州)

description.zh-cn: 作为主要政党对手，拜登在2020年总统选举中击败了时任总统川普。
description.en: As a major political opponent, Biden defeated incumbent President Trump in the 2020 presidential election.

relationships.target: 美国参议院司法委员会
美国参议院外交委员会

description.zh-cn: 作为参议院司法委员会主席，拜登反对罗伯特·博克的最高法院大法官提名，该提名最终被否决。
description.en: As Chairman of the Senate Judiciary Committee, Biden opposed Robert Bork's nomination to the Supreme Court, which was ultimately rejected.

description.zh-cn: 作为参议院司法委员会主席，主持了克拉伦斯·托马斯的最高法院提名听证会。
description.en: As Chairman of the Senate Judiciary Committee, presided over the Supreme Court confirmation hearings for Clarence Thomas.

description.zh-cn: 在克拉伦斯·托马斯提名听证会期间，主持了安妮塔·希尔关于性骚扰指控的作证。他对听证会的处理方式受到了批评。
description.en: During the Clarence Thomas confirmation hearings, he presided over Anita Hill's testimony regarding sexual harassment allegations. His handling of the hearing drew criticism.

description.zh-cn: 投票反对授权发动海湾战争。
description.en: Voted against the authorization for the Gulf War.

description.zh-cn: 最早呼吁解除对波斯尼亚的武器禁运、进行空袭并调查战争罪行。
description.en: Was one of the earliest to call for lifting the arms embargo, training Bosnian Muslims, supporting with NATO airstrikes, and investigating war crimes in Bosnia.

description.zh-cn: 在巴尔干地区访问期间与米洛舍维奇会面，并称他为“该死的战犯”。
description.en: Met with Milošević during a visit to the Balkans and called him a 'damned war criminal'.

description.zh-cn: 投票赞成授权对伊拉克使用军事力量的决议，但后来成为该战争的批评者。
description.en: Voted in favor of the resolution authorizing military force against Iraq, but later became a critic of the war.

description.zh-cn: 在2008年总统选举中选择拜登作为他的竞选搭档。
description.en: Chose Biden as his running mate in the 2008 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 作为副总统，多次与时任参议院少数党领袖麦康诺就重大立法进行谈判，包括2010年税收法案和2011年债务上限危机。
description.en: As Vice President, frequently negotiated with then-Senate Minority Leader McConnell on major legislation, including the 2010 tax deal and the 2011 debt-ceiling crisis.

description.zh-cn: 枪击案发生后，奥巴马总统任命拜登领导枪支暴力特别工作组。
description.en: Following the shooting, President Obama appointed Biden to lead a task force on gun violence.

description.zh-cn: 博·拜登的去世是乔·拜登决定不参加2016年总统竞选的一个主要因素。
description.en: The death of Beau Biden was a major factor in Joe Biden's decision not to run for president in 2016.

description.zh-cn: 在上任第一天签署行政命令，让美国重返《巴黎协定》。
description.en: Signed an executive order on his first day in office for the United States to rejoin the Paris Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 提出并签署了1.9万亿美元的COVID-19经济刺激救济方案。
description.en: Proposed and signed the $1.9 trillion COVID-19 economic stimulus relief package.

description.zh-cn: 下令从阿富汗撤出所有美军，结束了长达20年的阿富汗战争。
description.en: Ordered the withdrawal of all U.S. troops from Afghanistan, ending the 20-year war.

description.zh-cn: 撤军的混乱以及阿富汗政府的迅速垮台导致拜登的民意支持率大幅下降。
description.en: The chaotic nature of the withdrawal and the swift collapse of the Afghan government led to a significant drop in Biden's public approval ratings.

relationships.target: 基础设施投资和就业法案

description.zh-cn: 签署了1.2万亿美元的跨党派基础设施法案。
description.en: Signed the $1.2 trillion bipartisan infrastructure bill into law.

description.zh-cn: 签署了《2022年降低通胀法》，涉及气候、医疗保健和税收改革。
description.en: Signed the Inflation Reduction Act of 2022, addressing climate, healthcare, and tax reform.

description.zh-cn: 在2022年俄罗斯入侵乌克兰后，坚决支持乌克兰，并领导国际社会对俄罗斯实施制裁和向乌克兰提供援助。
description.en: After the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine, strongly supported Ukraine, leading international efforts to sanction Russia and provide aid to Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 与澳大利亚和英国领导人共同宣布成立AUKUS安全伙伴关系。
description.en: Announced the AUKUS security partnership with the leaders of Australia and the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 大力支持芬兰加入北大西洋公约组织。
description.en: Strongly supported Finland's accession to NATO.

description.zh-cn: 大力支持瑞典加入北大西洋公约组织。
description.en: Strongly supported Sweden's accession to NATO.

relationships.target: 乔·拜登退出2024年美国总统选举

description.zh-cn: 由于健康和年龄问题受到质疑，宣布放弃竞选连任。
description.en: Announced he was withdrawing his campaign for re-election amid questions about his health and age.

description.zh-cn: 在宣布退出2024年总统竞选后，表态支持副总统贺锦丽代表民主党参选。
description.en: After announcing his withdrawal from the 2024 presidential race, he endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris to run as the Democratic Party's nominee.

position.en: United States Secretary of the Treasury

description.zh-cn: 动用总统权力特赦其儿子亨特·拜登的联邦罪行。
description.en: Used his presidential power to pardon his son, Hunter Biden, for federal crimes.

description.zh-cn: 作为副总统和总统，多次与中国领导人习近平会晤和通话，处理中美关系。
description.en: As Vice President and President, has met and spoken with Chinese leader Xi Jinping on multiple occasions to manage U.S.-China relations.

description.zh-cn: 作为副总统和总统，多次与俄罗斯总统普京会晤，讨论军控和地缘政治问题。
description.en: As Vice President and President, has met with Russian President Vladimir Putin on several occasions to discuss arms control and geopolitical issues.
